backend/main.mo: Implements user profile storage with access control checks and exposes queries for profiles, roles, and read‑only phone/crypto report tables.
feature_evidence.json: Defines feature evidence entries listing related frontend files, components, test IDs, and descriptions for multiple Advanced Contact Lookup features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries for numerous frontend files covering components, i18n, routing, PWA, and backend actor bindings.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind‑based OKLCH color variables and dark‑mode overrides for app-wide styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point configuring metadata, icons, manifest, and bootstrapping the React application.
frontend/PHASE3A_READONLY_FRONTEND_NOCHA: Documents that Phase 3a adds a read‑only database canister requiring no frontend changes and outlines verification steps.
frontend/PRODUCTION_BUILD_VERIFICATION.m: Detailed checklist for validating the production build, covering routing, consent modal, branding, analysis features, offline caching, and reporting flow.
frontend/public/404.html: SPA fallback page that redirects known routes back to the app shell while displaying a simple redirect message.
frontend/public/data/public-contact-look: Static dataset providing example public lookup info for specific phone numbers and email addresses.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: Defines PWA settings, metadata, and icons for the AntiFraud app.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Implements a network-first caching service worker with precaching and offline fallback.
frontend/PWA_WEBAPK_ANDROID_TEST.md: Step‑by‑step instructions for verifying WebAPK installation behavior on Android Chrome and determining whether installation succeeds as a real app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling routing, consent gate, PWA setup, and service worker registration.
frontend/src/backend.idl.ts: IDL definition exposing a single analyzeText text-processing canister method.
frontend/src/components/AdvancedContactL: Component for validating and analyzing phone/email inputs with public lookup and offline caching.
Displays antifraud results, public info, and reporting options for a contact lookup.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Provides the main UI layout with navigation, header, responsive menu, and language/auth controls.
frontend/src/components/AuthControl.tsx: Manages login/logout via Internet Identity and shows user profile menu when authenticated.
frontend/src/components/CollaborativeRes: Shows community risk scores, categories, and counts for collaborative fraud reports.
frontend/src/components/ConsentGateModal: Modal requiring users to accept cookies and terms before continuing, with links to terms and privacy pages and enforced confirmation checks.
frontend/src/components/DashboardQuickAc: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/InstallButton.ts: Button that triggers PWA installation and alerts the user if installation isn't eligible.
frontend/src/components/LanguageSelector: Dropdown for choosing the UI language from a predefined list, updating the app's current language.
frontend/src/components/PwaInstallAction: Small button that runs the PWA install trigger without eligibility warnings.
frontend/src/components/ReportSubmission: Dialog for anonymously submitting spam/phishing/scam reports with category selection and optional description.
frontend/src/components/StructuredAnalys: Card displaying a structured fraud analysis result including risk level, explanation, recommendation, sources, and collaborative basis.
User profile panel showing principal ID, lookup history with clear option, and a logout button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdvancedContactLoo: Hook managing localStorage-backed caching of contact lookup results with add, get, and clear functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useAntiFraudActors.ts: Initializes and manages IC canister actors using the user's identity, handling readiness logging and error recovery.
frontend/src/hooks/useConsentGate.ts: Manages a localStorage-based consent gate that requires users to accept terms before proceeding.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication via Internet Identity, exposing identity state, login, and logout through React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useOfflineStatus.ts: Tracks browser online/offline status and exposes simple flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitLookupReport: Submits anonymous lookup reports locally with simulated delay and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Loads and manages per-identity user history stored in localStorage.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Provides language state and translations through React context with sessionStorage persistence.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Contains Portuguese translation strings for the UI, including navigation and feature texts.
frontend/src/ic/actors.ts: Creates HttpAgent instances and typed actors for main, extra, and reports canisters.
frontend/src/ic/canisterIds.ts: Defines and exposes fixed canister IDs for the app's IC services.
frontend/src/ic/idl/extra.idl.ts: Defines Candid interface for the extra canister, exposing phone and crypto report queries.
frontend/src/ic/idl/main.idl.ts: Defines Candid interface for the main canister with a text analysis method.
frontend/src/ic/idl/reports.idl.ts: Defines Candid interface for the reports canister, supporting report submission and lookup queries.
frontend/src/ic/readinessReport.ts: Generates and logs a readiness report showing available canisters and method support for main, extra, and reports actors.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light/dark themes, accessibility, and mobile touch targets.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/DocumentationPage.tsx: Renders a documentation overview page with i18n text, SEO setup, and a button to generate a PDF.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Provides the main fraud‑analysis UI with tabs for message, email, phone, and crypto checks using structured analysis utilities.
frontend/src/pages/HowItWorksPage.tsx: Displays an accordion‑based explanation of verification methods with SEO setup and i18n content.
frontend/src/pages/InstitutionalMissionP: Empty placeholder file for an institutional mission page.
frontend/src/pages/InstitutionalPage.tsx: Empty placeholder file for an institutional page.
frontend/src/pages/MissionPage.tsx: Shows the mission, vision, values, and limitations of the platform using i18n text with SEO setup and defensive rendering.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPage.tsx: Renders the privacy policy page with localized text, SEO metadata, and multiple content sections using defensive paragraph rendering.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Renders the terms and conditions page with localized text, SEO metadata, and sectioned content using a paragraph rendering helper.
frontend/src/pwa/install.ts: Manages PWA installation prompts by capturing the deferred install event and exposing a trigger function.
frontend/src/router/useSimpleRouter.ts: Implements a lightweight client-side router using history API, shared state, and custom navigation events.
frontend/src/utils/antifraudTextNormaliz: Provides text normalization utilities and keyword-matching helpers for accent-insensitive antifraud checks.
frontend/src/utils/contactInputHeuristic: Detects, normalizes, and validates phone or email input with basic heuristics and multilingual error messages.
Generates a full documentation structure combining static text with Portuguese translations for institutional pages.
frontend/src/utils/emailHeuristics.ts: Analyzes emails with deterministic heuristics to flag suspicious domains, patterns, or formats.
frontend/src/utils/generateDocumentation: Builds a text-based documentation file from structured content and triggers a client-side download.
frontend/src/utils/localRateLimit.ts: Implements a 1‑minute local cooldown using localStorage to limit repeated submissions.
frontend/src/utils/messageHeuristics.ts: Performs heuristic scam scoring on messages using keywords, crypto patterns, URLs, and punctuation to assign a risk level.
frontend/src/utils/publicContactLookup.t: Loads a local JSON dataset and looks up public contact metadata for phones or emails.
frontend/src/utils/seo.ts: Sets dynamic document titles and meta descriptions with AntiFraud branding.
frontend/src/utils/structuredFraudAnalys: Provides structured fraud‑risk evaluation with templates, indicators, and localized explanations.
frontend/src/utils/translateBackendResul: Translates backend‑generated Portuguese scam analysis text into other languages using a dictionary.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters across navigation and hash-based routing.
frontend/src/utils/userProfileStorage.ts: Stores, retrieves, and clears per-user history and preferences in localStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config enabling dark mode, content scanning, extended theming (colors, typography, animations), and plugin setup.
project_state.json: JSON metadata describing project state, architectural notes, known issues, and PWA installation flow requirements for the AntiFraud LIVE app.
